# f5distributedcloud_service_mesh (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_service_mesh` resource manages Service Meshes in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Service Meshes provide service-to-service communication management.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_service_mesh" "example" {
  name      = "app-mesh"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
  mesh_type = "INGRESS"
  enabled   = true
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mesh_type` (String) Type of service mesh (INGRESS, EGRESS, SIDECAR).
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the service mesh is enabled.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
